Model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inventory class meant to hold parts and products for later access. Future Enhancement: Can be improved in the future by better utilizing inheritance to access lists and methods in different contexts
